text.section: The Kentucky Adult Education Program shall provide technical assistance to providers to develop family literacy services. The technical assistance shall be evaluated on a regular basis by contracted evaluators outside the program.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 87, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 526, secs. 11 and 26, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 145, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 456, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 470, sec. 25, effective July 1, 1990; and ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 406, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 378, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/13/90). The Act amending this section prevails over the repeal and reenactment in House Bill 940, Acts ch. 476, pursuant to Section 653(1) of Acts ch. 476.
